div.p: People have sent us inquiries about all kinds of programming languages. You are welcome to choose any programming language that runs on the public UNIX computers in the lab. For handing-in products ("shipping"), you must also provide a script that Richard can invoke from the command line.
If the "command-line" restriction represents a hardship for you, please send me a one-page memo (plain text!) and request an exception. Those will be granted on a case-by-case basis.
